title: Hogs caracter of a projector wherein is disciphered the manner and shape of that vermine : with some other witty conceits unhappily falling out in these distracted times in the kingdom of England and Ireland : and
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
notes: Described in Proceedings & papers of the Oxford bibliographical society, vol. 1, p. 138.
From "Machiavel" by T. Heywood.  Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
